column1: It is composed by the Governor of the State of Trujillo and a group of State Secretaries chosen by him to assist him in the government functions. The Governor is elected by the people through direct and secret vote for a period of four years and with the possibility of one or more reelections as of 2009 for an equal period
column2: being in charge of the state administration.

column1: Since 1989 the Governors are chosen in direct elections by the people

column3: direct and secret vote every four years
